Uses of Class
com.sun.xacml.finder.PolicyFinder

Packages that use PolicyFinder
com.sun.xacml This is the root package, which contains the PDP class where most people will want to start. 
com.sun.xacml.finder The finder package supports all of the pieces of the XACML specification that require custom implementation. 
com.sun.xacml.support.finder   
com.sun.xacml.test

Methods in com.sun.xacml that return PolicyFinder
 PolicyFinder PDPConfig.getPolicyFinder()
          Returns the PolicyFinder that was configured, or null if none was configured

static PolicyReference PolicyReference.getInstance(org.w3c.dom.Node root, PolicyFinder finder)
          Deprecated. As of 2.0 you should avoid using this method and should instead use the version that takes a PolicyMetaData instance. This method will only work for XACML 1.x policies.

          Creates an instance of a PolicyReference object based on a DOM node.
